generated_text:
- road: The image shows a multi-lane asphalt road with white lane markings and traffic flow, including cars and a bicycle.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible on both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and vegetation.
- building: Multi-story residential buildings are visible on both sides of the street.
- vegetation: Numerous trees and some bushes are present along the sidewalks and in front of the buildings.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: Pedestrians are visible on the sidewalk, including one walking near the right side of the road.
- rider: A person is riding a bicycle in the middle of the road, in the bike lane.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road, including sedans and SUVs, parked and in motion.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection, with green lights indicating go for traffic.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including directional signs and parking signs, mounted on poles.
- pole: Several poles are visible, supporting traffic lights and traffic signs.
- motorcycle: No motorcycle is visible in the image.
